price: 13. Ainsi que l’affection et la pureté, par Notre grâce ; et il était pieux,
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
